decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The existing Cypress tree screen adjoining the wall shall be protected during the course of the development.  Should the removal of any treees prove unavoidable, details of replacement trees and shrubs and such other measures as are necessary to protect the privacy of residents in Birkbeck Road shall be submitted in writing to and approved by the Local Planning Authority together with a time table for their implementation within one month of the removal of any tree.  Such details as are approved shall be implemented within the agreed time table and permanently retained.  REASON:     To protect neighbours living conditions and the setting of this listed building.
description: Repair of boundary wall between school site and rear gardens of nos. 21-25 Birkbeck Road
